trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around September 24th 2008
Summary: In responce to Gary Mayfield on the Red fire ball over the Cotton field
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around June just this past summer I was out on my back patio cutting wood up with my electric saw when I happen to look up above the pine tree lines and I seen this big round fire ball and I can still see it in my mind of what it looked like I remember like sparks where coming off of it I ran in to the house yelling for my mom she came out back with me and when she saw it she right away said it was a UFO and it didn't make no noise it just floated over the west end of our town towards the front of my Neighbors house so we ran out to the front of our porch and by the time we got out front it was gone I had made the report here on Mufon a while back about it and after seeing that red ball me and my mom have been seeing UFO's just about every night through out the whole summer and I have met up with a friend from Ohio who is also seeing them coming up out of the lake in East Lake Ohio and our Government Knows about them right along with the world of Governments I believe we are being invaded and I know that they are interested in our source of energy because of what we are seeing with these objects is a energy that can be linked to Earth well that's the conclusion we have come to and living under water can protect them from our Viruses and Germs being that their DNA make up is different then ours they are coming up out of the water
